combat1.name: Weaving Blade
combat1.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
combat1.description:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Fluttering Hasode
combat2.descriptionRaw: Dashes nimbly forward with silken steps. Once this dash ends, Chiori will summon the automaton doll "Tamoto" beside her and sweep her blade upward, dealing AoE Geo DMG to nearby opponents based on her ATK and DEF. Holding the Skill will cause it to behave differently. Hold Enter Aiming Mode to adjust the dash direction. Tamoto 路 Will slash at nearby opponents at intervals, dealing AoE Geo DMG based on Chiori's ATK and DEF. 路 While active, if there are nearby Geo Construct(s) or Geo Construct(s) are created nearby, an additional Tamoto will be summoned next to your active character. Only 1 additional Tamoto can be summoned in this manner, and its duration is independently counted. "Sakura red dyes the brocade, the fragrance suffuses the sleeves, the orioles intoxicated."
combat2.description:
Dashes nimbly forward with silken steps. Once this dash ends, Chiori will summon the automaton doll "Tamoto" beside her and sweep her blade upward, dealing AoE Geo DMG to nearby opponents based on her ATK and DEF.
Holding the Skill will cause it to behave differently.

Hold
Enter Aiming Mode to adjust the dash direction.

Tamoto
路 Will slash at nearby opponents at intervals, dealing AoE Geo DMG based on Chiori's ATK and DEF.
路 While active, if there are nearby Geo Construct(s) or Geo Construct(s) are created nearby, an additional Tamoto will be summoned next to your active character. Only 1 additional Tamoto can be summoned in this manner, and its duration is independently counted.
combat2.flavorText: "Sakura red dyes the brocade, the fragrance suffuses the sleeves, the orioles intoxicated."

labels: Upward Sweep Attack DMG|{param5:P} ATK+{param6:P} DEF

combat3.name: Hiyoku: Twin Blades
combat3.descriptionRaw: Twin blades leave their sheaths as Chiori slices with the clean cuts of a master tailor, dealing AoE Geo DMG based on her ATK and DEF. "Master one principle, and the path to all others shall open to you."
combat3.description: Twin blades leave their sheaths as Chiori slices with the clean cuts of a master tailor, dealing AoE Geo DMG based on her ATK and DEF.
combat3.flavorText: "Master one principle, and the path to all others shall open to you."

passive1.name: Tailor-Made
passive1.descriptionRaw:
#Gain different effects depending on the next action you take within a short duration after using <color=#FFD780FF>Fluttering Hasode</color>'s upward sweep. If you {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} the Elemental Skill, you will trigger the Tapestry effect. If you {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} your Normal Attack, the Tailoring effect will be triggered instead.

<color=#FFD780FF>Tapestry</color>
路 Switches to the next character in your roster.
路 Grants all your party members "Seize the Moment": When your active party member's Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, and Plunging Attacks hit a nearby opponent, "Tamoto" will execute a coordinated attack, dealing 100% of Fluttering Hasode's upward sweep DMG as <color=#FFE699FF>AoE Geo DMG</color> at the opponent's location. DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG.
路 "Seize the Moment" lasts 8s, and 1 of "Tamoto"'s coordinated attack can be unleashed every 2s. 2 such coordinated attacks can occur per "Seize the Moment" effect duration.

<color=#FFD780FF>Tailoring</color>
路 Chiori gains <color=#FFE699FF>Geo infusion</color> for 5s.

When on the field, if Chiori does not either {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} her Elemental Skill or use a Normal Attack within a short time after using Fluttering Hasode's upward sweep, the Tailoring effect will be triggered by default.
passive1.description:
Gain different effects depending on the next action you take within a short duration after using Fluttering Hasode's upward sweep. If you Press the Elemental Skill, you will trigger the Tapestry effect. If you Press your Normal Attack, the Tailoring effect will be triggered instead.

Tapestry
路 Switches to the next character in your roster.
路 Grants all your party members "Seize the Moment": When your active party member's Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, and Plunging Attacks hit a nearby opponent, "Tamoto" will execute a coordinated attack, dealing 100% of Fluttering Hasode's upward sweep DMG as AoE Geo DMG at the opponent's location. DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG.
路 "Seize the Moment" lasts 8s, and 1 of "Tamoto"'s coordinated attack can be unleashed every 2s. 2 such coordinated attacks can occur per "Seize the Moment" effect duration.

Tailoring
路 Chiori gains Geo infusion for 5s.

When on the field, if Chiori does not either Press her Elemental Skill or use a Normal Attack within a short time after using Fluttering Hasode's upward sweep, the Tailoring effect will be triggered by default.

passive2.name: The Finishing Touch
passive2.descriptionRaw: When a nearby party member creates a <color=#FFE699FF>Geo Construct</color>, Chiori will gain 20% <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG Bonus</color> for 20s.
passive2.description: When a nearby party member creates a Geo Construct, Chiori will gain 20% Geo DMG Bonus for 20s.

passive3.name: Brocaded Collar's Beauteous Silhouette
passive3.descriptionRaw:
When any party member is wearing an outfit apart from their default outfit, or is wearing a wind glider other than the Wings of First Flight, your party members will obtain the Swift Stride effect: Movement SPD is increased by 10%.
This effect does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, and the Spiral Abyss. Swift Stride does not stack.
passive3.description:
When any party member is wearing an outfit apart from their default outfit, or is wearing a wind glider other than the Wings of First Flight, your party members will obtain the Swift Stride effect: Movement SPD is increased by 10%.
This effect does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, and the Spiral Abyss. Swift Stride does not stack.
